metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7639 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read in load_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-7588. This is in a "16 bits colors" case, aka case 16.

criterions.comment: cimg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
